frameset.edef: to imitate, to copy, to assimilate oneself to

example.parse: (S (VP (CV+CVSUFF_SUBJ:2MS اجعلو) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ-3 (CVSUFF_DO:1P نا)) (S (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-3)) (NP-PRD (NP (NOUN مُجْتَمَع)) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG المَلائِكَة))))))) (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB عَسَى) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ إِنّ) (S (VP (IV1P+IV نَتَشبَّه) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-CLR (PREP بِ) (NP (PRON_3MS ُه))) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_ACC يوماً))))))))
